* Live mode improvements
* Sequencer mode improvements
* General stability and performance improvements
* Bug fixes according to users’ bug reports

* Disabling ads in-app purchase
* Intro tutorial video
* Live mode improvements

* Bugfixes
* Special Halloween sound pack
* Minor improvements

* Preset worldwide popularity info
* Audio system improvements
* General improvements
* Bugfixes

* New download indication
* Bugfixes

* More soundpacks from start
* Sequencer setup saved for each preset
* Tiny graceful UI improvements
* Bugfixes, as always :)
* Even more fun!

* 15 new soundpacks for any taste
* Soundpack difficulty levels
* Even better pad touch visual response
* Brand new video & tutorials list

* 15 new soundpacks for any taste
* Soundpack difficulty levels
* Even better pad touch visual response
* Brand new video & tutorials list

* Performance improvements
* Bugfixes

We added a new coaching system called "Beat School" which enables anyone quickly learn to play beats and music without leaving the application.
Now learning to play will be even easier. Just listen and try to repeat all by yourself!

- graphics improvements
- minor bugs fixed
* Bugfixes
* Bugfixes

* iPhone X support
* Beat School lessons for Shape Of You preset
* Improved pads’ visual effects
* Improved touch response time
* Bugfixes

- Performance and stability improvements

- New interface languages added: Russian, Chinese traditional, Chinese simplified, Portuguese, Italian, Turkish, Korean, Spanish, Polish, Thai, Vietnamese, Arabic
- Performance and stability improvements

We read all your reviews and always try to make the game better. Please leave us some feedback if you love what we do and feel free to suggest any improvements. Enjoy this powerful, yet easy-to-use tool to get the best music experience!

- Optimized for iOS 12, iPhone XS and XS Max
- Performance and stability improvements

We read all your reviews and always try to make the game better. Please leave us some feedback if you love what we do and feel free to suggest any improvements. Enjoy this powerful, yet easy-to-use tool to get the best music experience!

- The redesigned Drum Pad Machine focused on simplicity! We completely reconsidered and rebuilt the app to make it sleek and easy-to-use, even if you have no experience with beat maker apps
- We improved Beat School to make the learning process even easier! Unique lessons allow everyone to feel like a professional Beat Maker
- Performance and stability improvements
